backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor serving as the backend entry point with no implemented functionality.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting the replacement of Discord and Telegram cards with a single X (Twitter) Communities card in CommunitySection and Footer components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON file containing one-line summaries of each frontend source file, describing their purpose and key implementation details.
frontend/index.css: Base Tailwind CSS file defining OKLCH-based CSS custom properties for light and dark theme color tokens including background, foreground, card, and sidebar variables.
frontend/index.html: Minimal HTML entry point for the React app, mounting the root div and loading the main TSX module.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component that composes the full page layout by rendering Navigation, HeroSection, TickerBanner, AboutSection, TokenomicsSection, HowToBuySection, CommunitySection, and Footer in order.
frontend/src/components/AboutSection.tsx: Two-column section displaying a floating coin image with badges and humorous meme-coin copy explaining that $POINTLESS has no utility, no roadmap, and no promises.
frontend/src/components/CommunitySection: Community section featuring a single centered X Communities card linking to the $POINTLESS X community, plus a large CTA banner with a floating coin image and Buy/Join buttons — Discord and Telegram removed.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Site footer with brand logo, quick-links navigation, a single X Communities social icon, a legal disclaimer, dynamic copyright year, and caffeine.ai attribution — Discord and Telegram icons removed.
frontend/src/components/HeroSection.tsx: Renders the landing page hero section with a floating coin image, animated star particles, headline, ticker symbol, tagline, and CTA buttons that smooth-scroll to other sections.
Displays a three-step guide (create Phantom wallet, swap SOL for $POINTLESS, hold) with icons, descriptions, and tips for purchasing the token.
frontend/src/components/Navigation.tsx: Fixed top navigation bar with smooth-scroll links, a logo, a 'Buy $POINTLESS' CTA button, and a responsive mobile hamburger menu.
frontend/src/components/RoadmapSection.t: Empty file with no content or exports.
frontend/src/components/TickerBanner.tsx: Horizontally scrolling marquee banner displaying repeated promotional phrases about $POINTLESS token stats and slogans.
frontend/src/components/TokenomicsSectio: Shows tokenomics cards for total supply and team allocation, plus a copyable contract address, with a gold-themed dark UI.
frontend/src/components/TweetBanner.tsx: Empty file with no content or exports.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Custom hook that creates and caches an ICP backend actor (authenticated or anonymous) using React Query, and invalidates dependent queries when the identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides an Internet Identity authentication context and hook, managing AuthClient creation, login/logout flow, delegation validity, and exposing identity state and status flags.
frontend/src/index.css: Global CSS file that imports Google Fonts, sets up Tailwind directives, defines CSS custom properties for a dark/gold theme using oklch colors, and provides utility classes for gold glows, buttons, cards, and typography.
frontend/src/main.tsx: React app entry point that wraps the App component with QueryClientProvider (React Query) and InternetIdentityProvider before mounting to the DOM.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration extending the default theme with custom oklch-based color tokens (gold, dark), display/heading font families, gold box-shadow utilities, and keyframe animations for coin floating and glow pulsing.
project_state.json: Project state tracking file (version 15) describing the 'The Pointless Coin' meme coin website built on Solana, listing existing features such as hero, navbar, about, tokenomics, how-to-buy, roadmap, and community sections.
